survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on user experiences with online grocery shopping platforms, including satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery shopping services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for mobile-friendliness.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following online grocery platforms have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears to all respondents who selected any option except 'Rarely or never' in Q1
